project_descr: Project in Support of Electoral Cycles 2010-2012 in the African Portuguese Speaking Counties (PALOP) and Timor Leste

outputs.output_descr: Its specific objectives are to contribute to (1) improve electoral management capacities of EMB; to (2) consolidate lusophone Electoral Management Bodies within the Electoral Knowledge Networks and to disseminate tools and methodologies on electoral management, in Portuguese, adapted to the needs and specificities of the PALOP Timor Leste; and to (3) enhance Women and Youth's participation and improve the capacity of parliaments and media to fulfill their role, particularly in relation to the electoral process.

Its specific objectives are to contribute to (1) improve electoral management capacities of EMB; to (2) consolidate lusophone Electoral Management Bodies within the Electoral Knowledge Networks and to disseminate tools and methodologies on electoral management, in Portuguese, adapted to the needs and specificities of the PALOP Timor Leste; and to (3) enhance Women and Youth's participation and improve the capacity of parliaments and media to fulfill their role, particularly in relation to the electoral process.

Electoral laws, processe and intitutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration. Legislatures, regional elected bodies and local assemblies have sterngthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively.
